Privacy Policy

We are an intermediate services provider between customers who want to book truck/transport services and truck drivers/owners who want to offer services to customers.

Privacy Policy

How your personal information is used?

We use your personal information to provide the services you need. We use your personal information to resolve problems, troubleshoot problems, safe service, give updates, detect and protect from error, fraud and criminal activity.


  • Crediting cashbacks
  • For making payments
  • Crediting cashbacks
  • For researching and developing new products and services

and in the context of but not limited to our GPS Platform, Fastag Flatform, Fuel Platform, Loads Platform, Credit Platform, and for WTI Logistics Private Limited and other trademarks or registered entities from time to time.

What personal information is used?

  • Name of the User
  • E-mail address
  • Address
  • Credit card or debit card information (excluding passwords, PIN numbers, CVVs etc.)
  • Billing and transaction details
  • Any other information as required by Us
  • Password
  • Financial information such as bank account or credit card or debit card or other payment instrument details

Sharing your personal information

We use personel information to provide the services you request. We use the personel information to market to you. We also provide you the option to disable the option if you need. We may disclose personal information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to respond.

security procedures

We have implemented industry standard security policies, rules and technical measures, to protect any kind of personal sensitive information that we have under our control from unauthorized access, improper use or disclosure, unauthorized modification and unlawful destruction or accidental loss. By using our website application or downloading our mobile app you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. As this policy enables us to provide you a secure and a wholesome experience, we will not be able to register you, if you are not in agreement with these terms.
